text.text:
*I am so happy you wanted to meet my creators!!* 

They are all amazing developers with a desire to make useful coding tools for people like you!

*Billy Bunn:* Northern California transplant, full-stack JavaScript developer, and recovering public accountant. Left the finance world in 2019 to pursue his passion for serving clients and users through software development.
*<https://www.linkedin.com/in/williammbunn/|Billy's Linkedin>*

*Christ Merritt:* Full-stack Javascript developer who is excited about building things that make people's lives easier. Originally from England, he now lives in Seattle. He loves coffee and will take on anyone in a game of Ping Pong. *<https://www.linkedin.com/in/christopherknightmerritt/|Chris's Linkedin>*

*Erin Trainor:* Full-stack Javascript developer with a background in Environmental Science, project coordination and marketing. Loves creating beautiful applications that are focused on improving the user experience.
*<https://www.linkedin.com/in/erin-trainor-357301a1/|Erin's Linkedin>*

*Vanessa Wei:* Full-stack Javascript developer with a consulting background who is highly motivated by making things with creativity. Passionate about trouble shooting and exploring new ideas and concepts.
*<https://www.linkedin.com/in/vanessaweiwei/|Vanessa's Linkedin>*

*John Cokos:* I'm a chef, a developer, a helluva manager and motivator, and although nobody will give it to me, I'm taking full credit for turning the Internet upside down about 20 years ago ... taking some huge risks and making some equally huge impacts.

*Ix Procopios:* Born and raised in Washington State, I truly believe that feedback is a gift. As Angela Duckworth said, “Perseverance is the daily discipline of trying to do things better than we did yesterday.”
*Hannah Ingham:* JavaScript developer motivated to use technology as a way to connect people, empower consumers, and boost community engagement.
